title.rendered: SMX West Presentation about Onsite SEO + An Interview!

content.rendered:
I had the pleasure to speak on the Hardcore Local Tactics session at SMX West a couple weeks ago and wanted to post my slidedeck. There are some gems in it so please enjoy…

 

Onsite Local Search Tatics For Conversion and Ranking

View more PowerPoint from niftymarketing

Also, I was interviewed by Eddie Bluff of Site-Seekers on local search and the interview went live during the conference. We talk about the state of local, some theory behind the ecosystem and directories that work, Places Optimization and some onsite tactics.
